segments.text: to be honest , I'm really fed up with work at the moment . I need a break !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: are you doing anything this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to work on Saturday all day ! I really hate my job !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , that's my only day off until Thursday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , well , my friends and I are planning on going to the beach on Sunday . We tend to leave around noon whenever we go anywhere , so you could still sleep in . Do you want to come with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that'd be fantastic ! Which beach are you going to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's a quiet beach just about an hour outside of the city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what should I bring with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we've got plenty of inflatables , but if you want to sit on a chair , you'll have to bring your own sunlounger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can just use my beach towel . I love lazing around in the sun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've actually never tired . Do you have a surfboard ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we've got a few . I can teach you how to surf on Sunday . It'll be fun !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't wait ! It sounds like we're going to have a great time . How much money should I bring ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you'll just need roughly $ 10 for food and gas money . My friend is driving , so we usually all chip in a few dollars for gas money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok , where and when should I meet you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we'll pick you up at your place at noon . Be there or be square !
segments.speaker: S1
